Race.SpecificTitle: PW Police Jury (Prop.#1) -- Prop. #1 - 8.28 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Propositions

Proposition No. 1
(Millage Continuation)

Summary:  10 year, 8.28 mills property tax continuation for acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining, operating and/or supporting the Catahoula Parish Library and its branches, including purchasing books and equipment therefor.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Catahoula, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy and collect a tax of eight and twenty-eight hundredths (8.28) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $401,200 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2010 and ending with the year 2019, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining, operating and/or supporting the Catahoula Parish Library and its branches, including purchasing books and equipment therefor?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Police Jury (Prop. #2) -- Prop. #2 - 2.07 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Propositions

Proposition No. 2
(Millage Continuation)

Summary:  10 year, 2.07 mills property tax continuation for acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating the public health units of Catahoula Parish.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Catahoula, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy and collect a tax of two and seven hundredths (2.07) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $100,300 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2010 and ending with the year 2019, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining, and/or operating the public health units of the Parish?

Race.SpecificTitle: Larto-Mayna Rec. Dist. -- 5.20 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Larto-Mayna Recreation District Proposition
(Tax Continuation)

Summary:  10 year, 5.20 mills property tax continuation for acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating recreational facilities of Larto-Mayna Recreation District.
Race.FullText: Shall Larto-Mayna Recreation District of the Parish of Catahoula, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of five and twenty hundredths (5.20) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $28,840 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2010 and ending with the year 2019, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating recreational facilities of the District?
